Question 50 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
NAT (2M) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Question ID : 823251583 
 
A five-stage pipeline has stage delays of 150, 120. 150, 160 and 140 nanoseconds. The registers that are 
used between the pipeline stages have a delay of 5 nanoseconds each. The total time to execute 100 
independent instructions on this pipeline, assuming there are no pipeline stalls, is ________ 
nanoseconds. 
Ans.  17160 
Sol.
